# Notes MVP
## Installation
### server
[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/44be458f4e93266e538c#?env%5BNotes%)
```sh
$ cd server
$ yarn install
$ yarn dev
```
### client
Open new terminal in project's directory
```sh
$ cd client
$ yarn install
$ yarn start
```
Navigate to localhost:3000 in your browser to see web interface of the app
